name: Strength
effect: increases ATK by 15%

name: Steel
effect: Gain invincibility for 2 turns at the start of battle. Invincibility prevents you  from taking damage.

name: Echo
effect: 35% chance for extra turns on each action

name: Valor
effect: Increases your max HP for the duration of battle. Each action removes a Golden Buff from each enemy.

name: Burn
effect: 35% chance to inflict Physical Burn to targets on perfect basic attacks

name: Strike
effect: Grants Counterstrike for 3 turns at the start of battle. Counterstrike gives a 35% chance to immediatley attack the enemy that just attacked you

name: Redemption
effect: Remove 2 beneficial from all enemies at the start of battle. Grant Echo and Physical Reflict Shield to all allies upon death

name: Necropolis
effect: Reduces the Max HP of the target once per hit (up to a maximum of 70%) and has a 35% chance to inflict Permadeath for 2 turns on perfect basic attacks

name: Piercing
effect: 35% chance to gain Armor Penetration on perfect basic attacks

name: Guardian
effect: Increase ATK by 20% of DEF

name: Iron
effect: Increases DEF 15%

name: Hunter
effect: Peefect Basic Attacks have a 35% chance to Ignite targets for 2 turns. Deals additional damage to targets that are Ignited. Ignite doubles physical damage targets take

name: Explosive
effect: 35% chance to deal additional physical damage on all enemies. And then a 35% chance to inflict Grievous Burn and HP Drain on perfect basic attacks

name: Meteor
effect: Grants Meteor Skill to wearer
comment: Deals physical damage to all enemies. 60% chance to inflict up to 6 Physical Burns for 3 turns. Grant an extra turn to self and a random ally

name: Prime
effect: Perfect Basic Attacks have a 45% chance to grant Perfect Immunity to self and a random ally for 2 turns

name: Rage
effect: Grants Rage Spear Skill to wearer
comment: Deals 6 hits of physical damage to all enemies. Disable enemy passive for 2 turns. Heal all allies based on your max ATK stat. Instantly gain and extra turn

name: Thorn
effect: 35% chance to grant Thorn Shield to all allies on perfect basic attacks. Thorn Shield refects Physical and True Damage and inflicts Heal Block and Permadeath to enemies

name: Dominance
effect: 35% Chance to gain random offensive buff when you take damage. 50% Chance to heal for 20% of Max HP when you take damage

name: Saint
effect: Revive the first ally that dies in battle with Invincibility and HP Regen for 1 turn

name: Present
effect: 35% chance to remove Immunity and inflict Punishent on the enemy for 2 turns. Grant Lifesteal to allies for 1 turn on each basic attack. 20% chance to grant an extra turn to a random ally on each basic attack.

name: Firestorm
effect: Grants Firestorm SKill which deals 5 hits of physical damage to random enemies with a 35% chance to inflict Flame and 15% chance to inflict Stun on each enemy each hit.

name: Viper
effect: Reduce all damage taken by 60%, gain a 75% chance to counter when attacked. 85% chance to inflict Perfect Bleed & 35% chance to inflict Perfect Corruption and Perfect Disable!

name: Siege
effect: Grants Immunity to Physical Damage, Remove all Beneficial Effects including Golden Effects and inflict Perfect Accuracy Down on a random enemy for 2 turns every turn. Decrease the Max HP of all enemies by 2% whenever you take damage

name: Penance
effect: Inflict Passive Disable on up to 2 enemies for 1 turn every turn

name: Trooper
effect: Reduce Damage taken by 50%, and also reduce damage allies take by 35%. This set also grants Perfect Immunity and Echo to each ally when you take damage, and permanently increases 2 random stats on each ally by 5% every time you attack.

name: Orbit
effect: Grant immunity to true damage o all allies. Remove negative effects from all allies and Beneficial Effects on all enemies every action. Permanently increase MR and DEF by 5% every turn at the start of your turn.

name: Cyclone
effect: 35% chance to grant a Cyclone Shield to all alllies on perfect basic attacks. Cyclone Shield reduces Magic and True Damage taken and reflicts True Damage to all enemies with a 45% chance to Silence for 1 turn

name: Penetrating
effect: 45% chance to gain Magic Penetration on perfect basic attacks

name: Inspiration
effect: 45% chance to extend the duration of Benefical Effects for 2 turns on peerfect basic attacks. Lower the duration of Benefical Effects on enemies by 1 turn with each atction

name: Life
effect: Grants HP Regen for 2 turns at the start of battle

name: Shock
effect: 35% chance to apply Shock on perfect basic attacks

name: Oracle
effect: Grants increased Max HP for each ally for 3 turns at the start of battle, Transfer random negative effects inculding Silver Effects from self to random enemies and heal youself 35% of Max HP each turn

name: Paladin
effect: Increase Magic by 15% of MR

name: Freezing
effect: 12% chacne to freeze targets on perfect basic attacks

name: Predator
effect: Perfect Basic Attacks of a 35% chance to Smite targets for 2 turns. Deals additional damage to Smited targets, Smite doubles Magic Damage targets take

name: Destiny
effect: Reduces all damage delt to allies by 20% and genertates a random Defensive Effect on self when you take damage

name: Holy
effect: Increases Magic by 15%

name: Enduring
effect: Grants Endure for 3 turns at the start of battle

name: Soul
effect: Gain immunity to Doom, Perfect Corruption and Block Beneficial Effect, Gain Soul Portect for the duration of battle, Soul Protect

name: Comet
effect: Grants Comet Skill to wearer
comment: Deals magic damage to all enemies. 50% chance to Freeze enemies for 2 turns. Grant an extra turn to self and a random ally

name: Avenger
effect: Grants Revenge to self for 3 turns at the start of battle, Grants Revenge to all allies for 2 turns upon death

name: Lightning
effect: Grants Lightning Skill to wearer
comment: 3 hits of damnage to all enemies. 75% chance to Shock on each hit. 75% chance to Remove Beneficial Effects on each hit. Heal all allies based on your Magic stat. Instantly gain an extra turn

name: Ivory
effect: Increase MR by 15%

name: Future
effect: Grants Increased Accuracy and Power Generation for 3 turns at the start of battle

name: Snow
effect: Grants a Snow Shield for 2 turns at the start of battle. Grants immunity Stun Freeze and Taunt Effects

name: Fortune
effect: Reduce all damage taken by 40%. Heal all allies for 5% of your Max HP with a 35% chance to cleanse self when you take damage

name: Alchemy
effect: Grant Invincibility to all Allies at the start of battle. Transform Negative Effects into Beneficial Effects every turn. Permanetly reduce a radom stat by 5% every time you attack

name: Singularity
effect: Reduce damage dealt to all allies by 35%. Grant immunity to all allies for 1 turn at the start of battle. Grant immunity to passive disable and perfect disable to all allies after the first turn of the battle. Steal all beneficial effects, including golden effects, from a random enemy every turn.

name: Gate
effect:
Grant Immunity to Magic Damage.
Transform Negative effects on self, including Silver effects, at the start of battle, into a Random Beneficial Effect, including Golden Effects with a 25% chance of triggering this same effect every turn.
Permanently increase the max HP of all allies by 2% whenever you take damage.

name: Guard
effect: Gain Guard Shield at the start of battle for 2 turns

name: Advantage
effect: 50% chance to gain class advantage, and Perfect Hits status on perfect basic attacks

name: Energy
effect: 35% chance to steal power on perfect basic attacks

name: Shell
effect: Grants Damage Reduction Shield for 1 turn at the start of battle.

name: Heal
effect: Grants Healing Wind Skill to wearer. This skill will heal all allies based on their MAX HP and grant the caster an extra turn

name: Health
effect: Increases Max HP 15%

name: Power
effect: Gain a Power Shield for 2 turns at the start of battle. Power Shield reduces 25% of damage and genertates Power when hit

name: Ruin
effect: Increase ATK by 1% of HP

name: True
effect: Grants True Damage Reduction Shield to wearer that reduces true damage by 75% for 2 turns at the start of battle

name: Blind
effect: 35% chance to Blind targets on perfect basic attacks

name: Quake
effect: Grants Quake Skill to wearer
comment: Deals True Damage to all enemies. 75% chance to stun for 2 turns. Damage increases based on your Max HP. Instantly gain an extra turn

name: Eternal
effect: Grants each ally invulnerability against Physical, Magical and True Damage randomly at the start of your turn, Grant Immortality or Endure a random ally for one turn every turn

name: Sacrificial
effect: Gain Perfect Heal Shield for 1 turn and grants Sacrifice Status for the duration of battle. Sacrifice fully heals your team when you die.

name: Sustaining
effect: Heal all allies by 3% of Max HP every turn. Heal for an additional 3% for each Beneifical Effect on you

name: Titan
effect: Grain Titan Shield for 2 turns at the start of Battle, and grants immunity to Heal Block and Heal Reduction Effect for the duration of battle

name: Crystal
effect: Increase MR by 1% of HP

effect: Increase Magic by 1% of HP

name: Stone
effect: Increase DEF by 1% of HP

effect: 12% chance to Stun targets on perfect basic attacks

name: Tower
effect: Gain a random Golden Defensive Effect every turn for 1 turn

name: Greed
effect: Steal a random beneficial effect from the target on basic attacks, Heal all allies for 5% of your Max HP on Perfect Attacks

name: Frontier
effect: Passive Reduce all damage taken by 50%. Permanently increase a random stat by 50% every turn and by 2% when you take damage

name: Brave
effect: grant a random offensive or defensive buff for 2 turns whenever you take damage.

name: Grail
effect: 50% chance to cleanse negative effects when you take damage

name: Angel
effect: Cleanse self and heal all allies for 5% of their Max HP every turn

name: Chance
effect: Grants Critical Strike chance for 3 turns at the start of battle

name: Primordial
effect: Grants one random Golden Effect to each ally, and inflicts one random Silver Effect on each enemy every turn

name: Purge
effect: Pefect Basic Attacks have a 45% chance to remove Benefical Effects on the target and heal yourself. 25% chance to Steal a Golden Effect each attack

name: Force
effect: Gain a Force Shield that blocks 6 attacks for 2 turns at the start of battle and grants immunity to Time Bomb for the duration of battle

name: Invisibility
effect: 35% chance to Vanish on perfect basic attacks

effect: 50% chance to remove Perfect Immunity and grant Perfect Health Buff to self for 2 turns on perfect basic attacks

name: Zone
effect: Grants Zone Eating Skill to wearer
comment: Deals random damage to all enemies. Inflicts Exhaust, Curse,  or Silence on enemies for 5 turns or Doom for 2 turns, Grants an extra turn to self and a random ally

name: Immunity
effect: Grants Immunity for 3 turns at the start of battle

name: Flash
effect: 35% to inflict 3 Blinding Burns on targets for 2 turns on perfect basic attacks, Any attacks against that are Blinded have  a 50% chance to remove Beneficial Effects and inflict Stun for 1 turn

name: Serenity
effect: Grants Immunity to all Silver Effects. Gain Cleanse Status for 2 turns at the start of battle. Cleanse all Negative Effects inculding Silver Effects from all allies and grants Cleanse and Regen to all allies for 2 turns upon death

name: Boost
effect: Increase Special by 25%

name: Thief
effect: 45% chance to Steal Fury on perfect basic attacks

name: Mimic
effect: Copies all Benefical Effects, including Golden Effect at the start of battle. Copy 1 Benefical Effect from a random enemy for each action

name: Rush
effect: increase Special by 25% of DEF.

name: Radiant
effect: Prevents the enemy from gaining offensive Golden Effects Grants you a random Defensive Effect every turn

name: Tomb
effect: Passive, Gain Perfect Health and Heal Shield for the duration of battle. 50% chance to Stune enemies inflicted with Stop or Seal for 2 turns at the start of every turn

name: Fools
effect: Beware! Your curiosity could kill you.
comment: They either freeze your team and the enemies, sleep your team and the enemies, or stack up HP Regen and crave on you and the enemies.

name: Banner
effect: Grants a random Shield to all allies at the start of battle
comment: Remove a beneficial effect from the enemy and heal self for 5% of Max HP every time an ally takes damage

name: Light
effect: Grant Perfect Immortality every turn for 1 turn. permanentaly increase one DEF stat by 1% whenever you take damage. Heal for 50% of Missing HP whenever you take damage below 50% Max HP

name: Sun
effect: Grant Immunity and a random beneficial effect if Invincibility is present at the start of your turn

name: Persecution
effect: Reduce damage taken by 35%. Reflect 30% of the damage received back to all enemies. 35% chance to inflict perfect heal block on each enemy for 2 turns when hit.

name: Space
effect: Grant Vanish to self every turn at the start of your turn. 35% chance to heal and remove negative effects from each ally every turn. Grant Physical, Magic and True Damage invulnerability for two turns to any ally that falls below 30% HP.

name: Nightmare
effect: 35% chance for perfect basic attacks to inflict Perfect Sleep on targets for one Turn. Pefect Sleep is a silver effect that can not be cleansed by most skills

name: Fate
effect: Grants Ascension, Immortality and Perfect Immunity for 1 turn every turn

name: Eclipse
effect: Grants Shroud for the duration of the battle. Shroud converts all damage to True Damage equal to 5% of your Max HP, and Immunity to Reduce Max HP Effects

name: Void
effect: 35% chance to trigger Void Shield on all allies on perfect basic attacks

name: Vampiric
effect: Heal for 20% of your Max HP on perfect basic attacks

name: Death
effect: Grant Death Mark Skill to wearer

name: Warlord
effect: Gain a random Offensive Effect when healed with a 15% chance to gain an extra turn if healed on your turn

name: Shadow
effect: Grants Vanish at the start of battle for 1 turn. Gain Vanish, Crit Chance and All Damage Charge for 1 turn if Perfect Hit is active on your turn

name: Assassin
effect: Increases ATK by 15% of Magic, and Magic by 15% of ATK

name: Resilience
effect: Increase HP by 50% of ATK and Magic

name: Resistance
effect: Increase DEF & MR by 25% of of ATK and Magic

name: Immortal
effect: Grants Perfect Immortality for 3 turns at the start of battle. Perfect Immortality will auto-revive you with 60% of HP if you die with this buff active

name: Mark
effect: Mark a target with up to 3 marks at the start of battle, Inflict up to 3 marks on a target after each action, Remove all Beneficial Effects and inflict up to 4 marks on all enemies upon death

name: Venom
effect: Perfect Basic Attacks have a 35% chacne to deal additional True Damage to all enemies with a 35% chance to inflict Crave, Exhaust and Bloodlust for 2 turns

name: Hex
effect: Immune to Max HP reduction effects, Heal for 5% of your Max HP every turn, 50% chance to increase duration of negative effects on target for 1 turn

name: Trap
effect: Grants Trap Status for 2 turns at the start of battle. Trap Status removes Beneficial Effects, Stuns and inflicts Perfect Corruption on opponent if effect is stolen or forcefully removed

name: Labyrinth
effect: 60% Chance to take no damage when attacked. Take random damage based on 10% of your MAX HP and inflict Attack Down, Magic Down and Stop on each enemy for 1 turn when succesfully hit.

name: Reaper
effect: Reduce damage taken by 50%. 50% chance to remove Perfect Immunity from each enemy every turn. Remove all beneficial effects and inflict Perfect Bleed on a random enemy every turn.

name: Eternity
effect: Grants Perfect Hit to all allies at the start of battle for 2 turns. Grants Physical, Magic and True Block to self for 1 turn if Perfevt Hit, Regen or Charage is present at the start pf your turn.Remove All Beneficial Effects including Golden Effects, Stun and inflict Perfect Disable for 1 turn on a random enemy if Passive Disable is active on any enemy at the start of your turn. Fully heal and remove Doom effects from all enemies if the wearer of this talisman has Shawl or Styx passive

name: Rebellion
effect: Grant Immunity to Silence and Perfect Silence. 20% chance to remove all Silver effects from self and a random ally when you take damage

name: Quantum
effect: Take 40% reduced damage. Transform Beneficial effects into their golden versions for two turns at the start of your turn. Deal 6 additional hits of damage to targets that have Labyrinth talismans equipped after each action.

name: Cosmic
effect: Cosmic talisman effect varies depending on talisman kind
